name: Skorecery
description:
Modernizing and paying homage to some of gaming's most iconic genres and arcade hits,Skorecery combines retro classics like Pong and Breakout with the excitement and depth from popular platform fighters.

Players must harness Spells and precise controls to destroy their opponent's Runes while also protecting their own. Up to 4 local sorcerers can battle for supremacy in fast-paced and engaging skirmishes.
